comment.author: 60818660@N08
comment._content:
Hi there,
I’m working on a documentary film and would really like to use this image for illustrative purposes to go under a voice over, would it be possible to get permission from you to use it?

comment.author: 36988361@N08
comment._content: Please email Yeshiva University Museum's Collections Curator Bonni-Dara Michaels (bdmichaels@yum.cjh.org) for information.
